text: Mark Hopley (born 1 May 1984) is a rugby union player for Northampton Saints in the Guinness Premiership. He was born in Crewe, Cheshire. He plays as a flanker. == Other websites == *Guinness Premiership profile Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:English rugby union players Category:People from Crewe Category:Sportspeople from Cheshire
title: Mark Hopley
